mapper.update: update edu_open_course set choose_num = choose_num + 1 where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT eoc.*, et.name as teacherName, ecourse.name as courseName, ec.name as roomName FROM `edu_student_course` esc, edu_open_course eoc, edu_teacher et, edu_classroom ec, edu_course ecourse WHERE esc.open_course_id = eoc.ID AND eoc.classroom_id = ec.ID AND eoc.course_id = ecourse.ID AND eoc.teacher_id = et.ID AND esc.student_id = #{studentId};
